text: ovvoru maṉitaṉaiyum avarkaḷiṉ talaivarkaḷuṭaṉ (vicāraṇaikkāka) nām aḻaikkum nāḷil, avarkaḷiṉ (tiṉacari kuṟippup) puttakam avarkaḷuṭaiya valatu kaiyil koṭukkappaṭṭāl avarkaḷ taṅkaḷ (atē tiṉacari kuṟippup) puttakattai (mikka makiḻcciyōṭu) vācippārkaḷ. (Avarkaḷuṭaiya kūliyil) ōr nūl aḷavu (kuṟaittu)m aniyāyam ceyyappaṭamāṭṭārkaḷ
